extendedInfo.description: Like to shoot pool? Come on to download Cool Billiards Game - Pocket Pool Pro for FREE right now!âââââ How to play âââââ- VERSUS MODEPlay against the computer AI with standard 8 ball rules or 9 ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction or press buttons to adjust cue angle slightly, drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to shoot. Touch and hold at any point to move the cue-ball and tap to confirm for Free-ball.- CHALLENGE MODEYou need to pocket all the balls on the table within the given number of cues. There is no time limit for this mode, but watch out there may have various traps and you have only limited number of cues.âââââ Highlighted Features âââââ  - Realistic 3D ball and great physical experience;- Various game modes, 8 Ball Pool, 9 Ball Pool and up to 150 levels arcade mode;- Player vs Computer AI (AI with 3 levels);- Various tables;- Bright and vibrant graphics & effects; We believe that everyone is a gamer at heart and that games are a great source of joy and relaxation. So Ezjoy always try to make the games easy and joy. For "Pocket Pool Pro", we want to make it the best pool game on Android and your 5-star reviews keep us inspired and motivated.Visit m.ezjoygame.com from your Android device to see more fantastic games.Enormous thanks to everyone for their playing, feedback, and support.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love this game. Smooth controls, realistic sounds, fun game
reviews.author: nicole andreola

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Every time I bought new anroid phone. I install dis app. Just too good for Pakistani coz this is great time pass when their is no light.... :p
reviews.author: Fawaz Khan

reviews.title: Would be awesome if trick shots was included.
reviews.comment: Add trick shot lessons with the game and we rated five stars!
reviews.author: Joseph Adams

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: There are better pool games available. The graphics and physics of this game are outdated.
reviews.author: Victor Ireri

reviews.title: Not fr the hardcore miniclip pool guy
reviews.comment: The physics engine seems entirely differnt frm the miniclip version. The balls seem a lot lighter.. This is the best offline pool though..
reviews.author: Srajan Jain

reviews.comment: It\'s a little bit difficult to control the stick when you\'re aiming it but other than that I would get it
reviews.author: Scott Thomas

reviews.title: Awesome for my tablet
reviews.comment: It\'s really easy and fun to use. Great time waster or fun on the go since it is not online.
reviews.author: Patrick Ordinario

reviews.title: 9 of 10 real good
reviews.comment: Could offer a tournament mode, or que upgrades
reviews.author: charles gaidosh

reviews.title: Controls could do with work
reviews.comment: Compared to other pool games like mini clip the controls really need a lot of work. The physics often go haywire and I think someone spilled glue on the table.
reviews.author: Adam Phillips

reviews.comment: Not bad. Plays godd but cue control could be better.
reviews.author: Paul Kuhn

reviews.title: This game sucks!!!!
reviews.comment: I thought this game was a fun way to pass time at first. However, it has started to falsely declare I\'ve lost to the computer in the versus mode! I lose my fair share of games, so I don\'t appreciate the unearned losses!!! Cheating game!!!!
reviews.author: janae hamilton

reviews.title: Nice ..
reviews.comment: Game play is smooth and easy .. Though u can add a bit of rich UI ..! :-)
reviews.author: Rash R

reviews.title: Okay I guess
reviews.comment: Doesnt feel right and cant get some angles that I wanted to get. Suppose its not all bad as graphics are decent but besides that theres nothing I want from this game.
reviews.author: John Pollard

reviews.title: Not bad at all
reviews.comment: A nice pool game, good graphics, very realistic. Stops me from giving a 5 star rating is due to the balls being very live, they take a long time instopping when you hit the ball, other than that, great game
reviews.author: Doris Lisowsky

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: Good but still failing to play fine. Learnng
reviews.author: kasozi isaac

reviews.title: Brilliant Billiards
reviews.comment: Just an incredibly fun game. Beautiful graphics, well designed game. Just like playing the real thing but without the beer and burgers. Never hangs. On a Nexus 10.
reviews.author: Marc Diaz

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: It is a great game I just wish it would not stop every 3/4 days and I have to reinstall it.
reviews.author: James Lewis

reviews.comment: Lov,Lov this pool game,just LIKE the real thing Ill give it a  5 STARS;-)\tGet this game lots of fun,Down Load NOW!!;  ;-) ;-)
reviews.author: Sandy Murray

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Love this game.Easy to use and lots of fun.good control and love playing against comp.
reviews.author: Michael Flathers

reviews.comment: The Best pool game without doubt
reviews.author: jason harrad
